title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4815.7 - Hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4815.7 - Hearings

State Regulations

The commission may hold hearings at which the applicant, or if the applicant is a corporation, its officers, directors, and stockholders
shall appear and testify under oath respecting the contents of the
application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4815.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
